allow: Bash(Rscript -e "tryCatch(source(''R/sys_vbse.R''), error=function(e) cat(''ERROR:'', e$message, ''\n'')); cat(''sys_vbse.R: OK\n'')")
Bash(Rscript -e "tryCatch(parse(file=''R/sys_variance.R''), error=function(e) cat(''PARSE ERROR:'', e$message, ''\n'')); cat(''sys_variance.R: OK\n'')")
Bash(Rscript -e "tryCatch(parse(file=''R/sys_multi_factor_analysis.R''), error=function(e) cat(''PARSE ERROR:'', e$message, ''\n'')); cat(''sys_multi_factor_analysis.R: OK\n'')")
